abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Centaurea solstitialis L." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Herbario EMMA. Herbario de la Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingenieros de Montes. UPM 1 records from Herbario de la Universidad de Sevilla, SEV-Historico 1 records from Herbarium of Jyväskylä University Museum 1 records from Plant Specimens of Kurashiki Museum of Natural History 1 records from ALA species sightings and OzAtlas 1 records from Flora exsiccata Bavarica 1 records from The Erysiphales Collection at the Botanische Staatssammlung München 1 records from Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, Dpto. Biología Vegetal, Banco de Germoplasma 1 records from Museu Darder de Banyoles 1 records from Plant specimens depodited in Osaka Museum of Natural History, Japan 1 records from Clémence Lortet herbarium 1 records from Photographs of higher plants, mosses, fungi, lichens, and algae 1 records from FloVegSI - Floristical and fitocenological database of ZRC SAZU 1 records from Floristic records from survey studies of the Bayerisches Landesamt für Umwelt 1 records from Polish gene bank – passport data of plants accessions which are important in human life 1 records from Observations floristiques PNM issues de la base de données flore du Conservatoire botanique national alpin 1 records from Botany Division, Yale Peabody Museum 1 records from Dr Mary Gillham Archive Project 1 records from Botanical Collections of the Åbo Akademi (TUR-A) 1 records from UKSBA Cyprus - Habitat Samples, 2019 1 records from Rotherham Biological Records Centre - Non-sensitive Records from all taxonomic groups 1 records from Données naturalistes de Pierre HUGUENY 1 records from Muséum d'histoire naturelle de Nîmes 1 records from HCDAL - Herbário Caririense Dárdano de Andrade-Lima 1 records from MHA Herbarium: collections of vascular plants 1 records from PAMP-tracheo: Vascular plants in Ribera Occidental de Navarra (Spain).
